column1: Cash Flow Statement Template - Costa Rica Business
- Monthly payments due last day of following month
- Quarterly advances due 15th of following month
- Based on 25% of prior year tax liability
- Input VAT on purchases reduces liability
- Classify cash flows into operating investing financing
- Can use direct or indirect method for operating activities
- IFRS 18 (2025): Start indirect method with operating profit
- Components of cash and cash equivalents
- Significant cash flows that do not affect cash
